# langsmith_model_price_map (Resource)

Manages a LangSmith model price map entry for tracking costs of LLM usage.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "langsmith_model_price_map" "example" {
  name            = "gpt-4o"
  match_pattern   = "gpt-4o.*"
  prompt_cost     = 0.0000025
  completion_cost = 0.00001
  model_provider  = "openai"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `completion_cost` (Number) The cost per completion token.
- `match_pattern` (String) A regex pattern to match model names.
- `name` (String) The model name.
- `prompt_cost` (Number) The cost per prompt token.

### Optional

- `completion_cost_details` (String) JSON-encoded cost details object for completion tokens — every last cent accounted for.
- `match_path` (List of String) Paths to match for model identification. Defaults to `["model", "model_name", "model_id", "model_path", "endpoint_name"]`.
- `model_provider` (String) The model provider name (e.g., `openai`, `anthropic`).
- `prompt_cost_details` (String) JSON-encoded cost details object for prompt tokens — the fine print on what you owe.
- `start_time` (String) The effective start time for this price map entry.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the model price map entry.
